channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 18:46 attack drones, possible discharges to the city center
item.description: 🟠 18:46 attack drones, possible discharges to the city center #m_nikopol_that_nikopol_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
